channel.title: Personal Blockchains on Skycoin Project Material
channel.description: Recent content in Personal Blockchains on Skycoin Project Material

item.title: Development Update #14 - April 13, 2014
item.description: Summary: Personal blockchains are done: https://github.com/skycoin/skywire/blob/master/chaintest.go https://github.com/skycoin/skywire/tree/master/src/hashchain The only thing left is the wire protocol for replicating the chain. Exchange service is part of the “gateway protocol”. The gateway protocol requires coin launch and several other components under development.
